descriptionHtml:
Once you rest, even for an hour, you are rested for 10,000,000 hours. This works for the Rested, Well Rested and Marriage Rested bonuses. Ten million hours translates into 416,666.66 days.

That\'s it.

Still reading this?

Shoo.. *waves hands*

*Edit: Forgot to upload the file last yesterday
author: Darkvirii

files.name: Infinite Rested and Well Rested Bonus
